definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 12:38 mixture, mixed company;—heterogeneous body attached to a people; to Israel Ex 12:38 (E), Ne 13:3; to Egyptians Je 25:20 (Vulgate joins to v:Je 25:19, so Gie); to Chaldeans Je 50:37; in Je 25:24 del. [[הָעֶרֶב]] …[[וְאֵת ]] as doublet (so Gie, cf. LXX); in 1Ki 10:15 rd. [[עֲרָב]] (as ‖ 2Ch 9:14, so Benz Kit al.); Ez Eze 30:5 rd. prob. id. (Co).
